meanings.definition: Refer to something briefly or casually.
meanings.sent1: She mentions her favorite book during the discussion.
meanings.sent2: He always mentions his dog when talking about pets.
meanings.sent3: The cat mentions the mouse as a potential playmate.
meanings.sent4: The teacher mentions the importance of studying for the upcoming test.
meanings.sent5: The news anchor mentions the breaking news to the viewers.

meanings.definition: Bring up or introduce someone or something in conversation or writing.
meanings.sent1: He mentions his friend's birthday party to the group.
meanings.sent2: She mentions the new project during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The detective mentions a suspect in the investigation.
meanings.sent4: The author mentions a mysterious character in the story.
meanings.sent5: The tour guide mentions the historical significance of the building.
